did.physloc: Materials may be stored off-site, and may require additional retrieval time. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.
did.abstract: This collection contains the International Brotherhood of Teamsters Office of the General Secretary-Treasurer records. Included are rosters dating from 1957-2009.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:
Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository.

Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the International Brotherhood of Teamsters, 2012 [2012.022]

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into 2 series: Rosters, and Manuals For Local Union Secretary Treasurers

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The General Secretary-Treasurer of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters is the custodian of all properties, funds, securities and assets of the IBT. The GS-T conducts all financial correspondence involving or affecting the union and correspondence regarding financial matters between the IBT and all its affiliates and subordinate bodies. The General Secretary-Treasurer has responsibility for maintaining current information on officers of local unions and joint councils and for issuing such information via annually updated Rosters.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the International Brotherhood of Teamsters Office of the General Secretary-Treasurer records. Included are rosters dating from 1957-2009, and Manuals dating from 1967-1978.

controlaccess.subject: Conferences
Labor unions -- United States -- History -- 20th century
Labor unions
Labor

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged Chronologically, Canadian Rosters are located at the end of the series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials in this series contain the rosters of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters. Included are rosters from local unions, dating 1989-2009 and rosters from the Canadian Conference of Teamsters, dating from 1986-1988. Each roster lists the title, address, and phone number of the local union as well as individual titles, adresses, and phone numbers of the General Executive Board and Trustees.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The General-Secretary-Treasurer of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters is responsible for accounting and budget, benefits, information systems, affiliate financial records and other finance-related functions. Production and updating rosters comes under this office's jurisdiction. Rosters provide names and contact information for members of the General Executive Board and Trustees, and officers of local unions, joint councils, state conferences, regional offices, and trade divisions and conferences. IBT rosters are updated and distributed each year in June.

did.unittitle: Manuals For Local Union Secretary Treasurers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials in this series contain the manuals of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters Local Union Secretary Tresurers. Included are manuals from local unions, dating 1967-1978. Included in each manual are guidelines for financial transactions including: recording cash transaction, reports to governmnet agencies, ect. At the end of each manual is an "exhibits" section which includes pre-printed examples of a working ledger book.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains ledgers from the General Secretary Treasurer from 1903 to 1906. These ledgers outline the daily expenditures of the union during its first few years.

did.unittitle: Daily Receipts and Expenditures Ledger Book

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains expense books from the IBT Office of the General Secretary-Treasurer.
